Class ObjectToIterable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.psddev.dari.util.ObjectToIterable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConversionFunction<Object,Iterable<Object>>

    public class ObjectToIterable
extends Object
implements ConversionFunction<Object,Iterable<Object>>
    Converts an object into an iterable.

      Iterable<Object> convert(Converter converter, Type returnType, Object object)
      Converts the given object into an instance of the given returnType.
      static Iterable<Object> iterable(Object object)
      Converts the given object into an iterable if it's an array or an instance of any of the following: Enumeration, Iterable, or Iterator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ObjectToIterable

    • Method Detail

      • iterable

        public static Iterable<Object> iterable(Object object)
        Converts the given object into an iterable if it's an array or an instance of any of the following: Enumeration, Iterable, or Iterator. This method differs from convert(com.psddev.dari.util.Converter, java.lang.reflect.Type, java.lang.Object) in that it'll return a null instead of returning a collection of one if it doesn't recognize the type.
